title: @Riot GypsyLord Holy crap, Jhin's Voiceover.
body: You weren't kidding. This is fantastic! Definitely creepy, but with bravado, cold intelligence, and flamboyant. He's got the right amount of director, painter, actor, and musician to really define his status as the Virtuoso. Absolutely fantastic!

replies.body: Considering he's supposed to be a psychopath, I was somewhat disappointed about his VO in some way. He's way too calculated and has very clear minded lines. Not that it's bad, it just doesn't seem to fit in some way.
Sounds exactly how I would expect a psychopathic assassin to sound.

ThanX!    Finding the right balance is always difficult on these things.  You want his themes to be easily understandable, yet diverse enough to feel like a real (psychopathic) person with some depth.     Kyle's sound design and our actor's amazing performance really hit it out of the park.
Who was the Voice actor by the way? Seeing all sorts of answers. Would love to know who exactly did it.
Wish Shaco came across this sadistic without being a comical trope
RiotUtora did a splend-tastic job of processing his VO. Can't wait for you guys to ULT with Jhin ;-)

This is the first I have heard of that Rioter... and the first thing I thought of was meeps.

I listened to it all as soon as I learned about it. Pass on our congratulations!

> [{quoted}](name=Nixtarma,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EilVYPGW,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-14T01:13:09.300+0000)
>
> the first thing I thought of was meeps.

Utora worked on Bard as well, so that's probably why!
Oh, Utora worked on it? I can see why it's so good!
